info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases and servers.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the auditing policy applies.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the auditing policy applies.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Database data masking policy

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the data masking rule applies.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a firewall rule.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Database data masking policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the data masking policy applies.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Server Firewall rule.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the data masking rule applies.

parameters.name: dataMaskingRule
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database data masking rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a data masking rule.

delete.description: Deletes an Azure SQL Server data masking rule.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the data masking rule applies.

parameters.name: dataMaskingRule
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database  data masking rule.

get.description: Returns a list of Azure SQL Database data masking rules.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the data masking rules applies.

post.description: Start an Azure SQL Data Warehouse database pause operation.To determine the status of the operation call GetDatabaseActivationOperationStatus.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Data Warehouse database to pause.

post.description: Start an Azure SQL Data Warehouse database resume operation. To determine the status of the operation call GetDatabaseActivationOperationStatus.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Data Warehouse database to resume.

get.description: Returns a list of Azure SQL Database restore points.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database from which to retrieve available restore points.

put.description: Begins creating a new Azure SQL Database or updating an existing Azure SQL Database. To determine the status of the operation call GetDatabaseOperationStatus.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database to be operated on (Updated or created).

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a database.

delete.description: Deletes the Azure SQL Database with the given name.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database to be deleted.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

get.description: Returns information about Azure SQL Database usages.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

put.description: Begins creating a new Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool or updating an existing Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool. To determine the status of the operation call GetElasticPoolOperationStatus.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool to be operated on (Updated or created).

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating an Elastic Pool.

delete.description: Deletes the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool with the given name.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool to be deleted.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Database inside of an Azure Sql Database Elastic Pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool to be retrieved.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns information about Azure SQL Database Elastic Pools.
Returns information about Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool Activity.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool for which to get the current activity.

get.description: Returns information about activity on Azure SQL Databases inside of an Azure Sql Database Elastic Pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Database inside of an Azure Sql Database Elastic Pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool to be retrieved.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The name of the region for which the Azure SQL capabilities are retrieved.

get.description: Returns details on recommended index.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL database.

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL database schema.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL database table.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL database recommended index.

put.description: We execute or cancel index operations by updating index state. Allowed state transitions are :Active          -> Pending          - Start index creation processPending         -> Active           - Cancel index creationActive/Pending  -> Ignored          - Ignore index recommendation so it will no longer show in active recommendationsIgnored         -> Active           - Restore index recommendationSuccess         -> Pending Revert   - Revert index that has been createdPending Revert  -> Revert Canceled  - Cancel index revert operation

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database schema.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database table.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database recommended index.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating index state.

delete.description: Deletes the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be dropped.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: The id of the replication link to be deleted.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Database Replication Link.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database to get the link for.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: The replication link id to be retrieved.

post.description: Begins failover of the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be failed over.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: The id of the replication link to be failed over.

post.description: Begins a forced failover of the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id which may result in data loss.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be failed over.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: The id of the replication link to be failed over.

get.description: Returns information about Azure SQL Database Replication Links.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database to retrieve links for.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Server Firewall rule.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the policy applies.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a secure connection policy.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Database secure connection policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the secure connection policy applies.

put.description: Begins creating a new Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrator or updating an existing Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrator. To determine the status of the operation call GetServerAdministratorOperationStatus.

parameters.name: administratorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrator.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating an Active Directory Administrator.

delete.description: Begins deleting an existing Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrator.To determine the status of the operation call GetServerAdministratorDeleteOperationStatus.

parameters.name: administratorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrator.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Server Administrator.

parameters.name: administratorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrator.

get.description: Returns a list of Azure SQL Server Administrators.

put.description: Creates a new Azure SQL Server.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a server.

delete.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Server.

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL Server.
Returns information about an Azure SQL Server.
Returns information about Azure SQL Server usage.

delete.description: Cancel a pending upgrade for the Azure SQL Server.

get.description: Returns information about Upgrade status of an Azure SQL Server.

post.description: Start an Azure SQL Server Upgrade.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for the Azure SQL Server Upgrade.

get.description: Returns information about a service tier advisor.

parameters.name: serviceTierAdvisorName

parameters.description: The name of the service objective to retrieve.

useServerDefault.description: Indicates whether the default server auditing policy is used for that Azure SQL Database.

eventTypesToAudit.description: Gets the events types of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

retentionDays.description: Gets the retention in days of the Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

id.description: Gets or sets the rule Id.

numberFrom.description: Gets or sets the numberFrom property of the masking rule.

numberTo.description: Gets or sets the numberTo property of the data masking rule.

prefixSize.description: Gets or sets the prefixSize property that is used for the data masking rule.

suffixSize.description: Gets or sets the suffixSize property that is used for the data masking rule.

code.description: Gets or sets the error code returned from the server.

message.description: Gets or sets the error message returned from the server.

target.description: Gets or sets the target of the error.

restorePointType.description: Gets the restore point type of the Azure SQL Database restore point.

restorePointCreationDate.description: Restore point creation time. Populated when restorePointType = CONTINUOUS. Null otherwise.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Earliest restore time. Populated when restorePointType = DISCRETE. Null otherwise.

edition.description: Gets or sets the edition for the Azure Sql Database being updated or created.

collation.description: Gets or sets the collation of the Azure Sql Database being created.  You cannot change change the collation of an existing Azure Sql Database.

maxSizeBytes.description: Gets or sets the maximum size of the Azure Sql Database being created or updated in bytes.

requestedServiceObjectiveId.description: Gets or sets the service objective to be applied to the Azure Sql Database being created or updated.

requestedServiceObjectiveName.description: Gets or sets the service objective to be applied to the Azure Sql Database being created or updated.

elasticPoolName.description: Gets or sets the name of the Elastic Pool to put the Azure Sql Database in.

sourceDatabaseId.description: Gets or sets the resource id of the database to use as the source for the copy being created.

createMode.description: Gets or sets the create Mode for the Azure Sql Database database being created.

targetServiceLevelObjective.description: Gets or sets targetServiceLevelObjective for upgrade hint.

columnType.description: Gets the type of Azure SQL Database table column.

ColumnProperties.description: Represents the properties of an Azure SQL Database table column.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties representing the resource.

Column.description: Represents an Azure SQL Database table column.

name.description: Gets the name of the impact dimension.

unit.description: Gets the unit in which estimated impact to dimension is measured.

changeValueAbsolute.description: Gets the absolute impact to dimension.

changeValueRelative.description: Gets the relative impact to dimension (null if not applicable)

OperationImpact.description: Represents impact of an operation, both in absolute and relative terms.

action.description: Gets the proposed index action. We suggest user to create missing index, drop unused index or to rebuild already existing index to improve its performance. Possible values are 'Create', 'Drop', 'Rebuild'.

state.description: Gets the state recommendation is in. Current options are: 'Active', 'Pending', 'Executing', 'Verifying', 'Pending Revert', 'Reverting', 'Reverted', 'Ignored', 'Expired', 'Blocked', 'Success'.

created.description: Gets the UTC datetime showing when this resource was created.

lastModified.description: Gets the UTC datetime of when was this resource last changed.

indexType.description: Gets the type of index (CLUSTERED, NONCLUSTERED, COLUMNSTORE, CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE)

schema.description: Gets the schema where table to build index over resides

table.description: Gets the table on which to build index.

columns.description: Columns over which to build index

includedColumns.description: Gets the list of column names to be included in the index

indexScript.description: Gets the full build index script

estimatedImpact.description: Gets the estimated impact of doing recommended index action.

reportedImpact.description: Gets the values reported after index action is complete.

RecommendedIndexProperties.description: Represents the properties of an Azure SQL Database recommended index.

properties.description: Gets the properties representing the resource.

RecommendedIndex.description: Represents an Azure SQL Database recommended index.

tableType.description: Gets the type of Azure SQL Database table.

columns.description: Gets the columns from this table.

recommendedIndexes.description: Gets the recommended indices for this table.

TableProperties.description: Represents the properties of an Azure SQL Database table.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties representing the resource.

Table.description: Represents an Azure SQL Database table.

tables.description: Gets the tables from this database.

SchemaProperties.description: Represents the properties of an Azure SQL Database schema.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties representing the resource.

Schema.description: Represents an Azure SQL Database schema.

collation.description: Gets the collation of the Azure SQL Database.

creationDate.description: Gets the creation date of the Azure SQL Database.

currentServiceObjectiveId.description: Gets the current Service Level Objective Id of the Azure SQL Database. This is the Id of the Service Level Objective that is currently active.

databaseId.description: Gets the Id of the Azure SQL Database.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Gets the recovery period starte date of the Azure SQL Database. This records the start date and time when recovery is available for this Azure SQL Database.

edition.description: Gets the edition of the Azure SQL Database.  The DatabaseEditions enumeration contains all the valid editions.

maxSizeBytes.description: Gets the max size of the Azure SQL Database expressed in bytes.

requestedServiceObjectiveId.description: Gets the configured Service Level Objective Id of the Azure SQL Database. This is the Service Level Objective that is being applied to the Azure SQL Database.

requestedServiceObjectiveName.description: Gets the name of the configured Service Level Objective of the Azure SQL Database. This is the Service Level Objective that is being applied to the Azure SQL Database.

serviceLevelObjective.description: Gets the Service Level Objective of the Azure SQL Database.

status.description: Gets the status of the Azure SQL Database.

elasticPoolName.description: Gets the name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool the database is in.

serviceTierAdvisors.description: Gets the list of service tier advisors for this database. Expanded property

upgradeHint.description: Gets the upgrade hint for this database.

schemas.description: Gets the schemas from this database.

defaultSecondaryLocation.description: Gets the default secondary region for this database.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties representing the resource.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of Azure Sql Databases housed in the server.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the metric display name.

currentValue.description: Gets or sets the current value of the metric.

limit.description: Gets or sets the current limit of the metric.

unit.description: Gets or sets the units of the metric.

nextResetTime.description: Gets or sets the next reset time for the metric.

edition.description: Gets or sets the edition for the Azure Sql Database Elastic Pool being updated or created.

dtu.description: Gets or sets the total shared DTU for the Sql Azure Database Elastic Pool.This must agree with the StorageMB if both are specified.

storageMB.description: Gets or sets storage limit for the Sql Azure Database Elastic Pool in MB.This must agree with the Dtu if both are specified.

databaseDtuMin.description: Gets or sets the minimum DTU all Sql Azure Databases are guaranteed.

databaseDtuMax.description: Gets the maximum DTU any one Sql Azure Database can consume.

state.description: Gets or sets requested index state. We execute or cancel index operations by altering index state. Allowed state transitions are :Active          -> Pending          - Start index creation processPending         -> Active           - Cancel index creationActive/Pending  -> Ignored          - Ignore index recommendation so it will no longer show in active recommendationsIgnored         -> Active           - Restore index recommendationSuccess         -> Pending Revert   - Revert index that has been createdPending Revert  -> Revert Canceled  - Cancel index revert operation

RecommendedIndexUpdateProperties.description: Update Azure Sql Database recommended index properties.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of the request.

RecommendedIndexUpdateParameters.description: Update Sql Azure Database recommended index state.
